title: Ticket #2976: Document ticket #412 in condor_config_val man page
description: As Brian Bockelman noticed, you can't dump a remote host or a specified daemon. Ticket 412 suggests that at least some of this behavior will be fixed eventually, but for now it makes sense to document it. Patch to come.
remarks:
2012-May-30 10:26:09 by smoler:
Using original ticket. We don't need a doc-only ticket for this.
